cause.description:
Instead of exchanging Christmas gifts (per normal custom) with his co-workers, when George was given a gift he in turn gave his co-worker a card stating that a donation had been made in their name to a charity called "The Human Fund"
1. Cheapness
2. Support Babo Bots Journey back to America.
3. A New Festivus Pole for the Costanza's
cause.name: "The Human Fund........Money For People"
